extension.summary: Alternate Timer view & editor for Myth PVR.
extension.description: A two pane view displays recording schedules and program showings per schedule.[CR][CR]Click on a recording schedule to edit preferences such as a series recording, and on a program showing to disable it for resolving conflicts etc.[CR]Add the initial recording from the guide and then use Myth PVR Schedules to edit preferences.
extension.disclaimer: Use with Myth backend version .27, Kodi Myth PVR add-on, Python 2.7 At own risk.
